short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create personal emails with the touch of your hand

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to easily create a personalized email to a LinkedIn user, simply by visiting their profile page and clicking the extension.

Once you have clicked the extension, it will generate a text based on the information on the profile page you are currently viewing. This means that you can quickly and easily craft a personalized message to the user, without having to spend time searching for their basic information.

We believe that this extension will be a valuable tool for anyone looking to connect with other professionals on LinkedIn. It's easy to use and can save you a lot of time.
